arts.ttl: Napoli Player Ratings vs Roma: Lukaku Makes Difference
arts.sum: Napoli made it seven consecutive home matches against Roma in Serie A without defeat with a gutsy 1-0 victory on Sunday evening. Romelu Lukaku returned to the scoresheet to decide the latest edition of the famous Derby del Sole, handing Claudio Ranieri a nightmarish touchline debut for the Giallorossi. arts.ttl: Conte on Napoli’s victory over Roma: “We responded with maturity”
arts.sum: Napoli reclaimed the top spot in Serie A with a narrow 1-0 victory against Roma, thanks to a decisive goal from Romelu Lukaku in the second half. After the match, Napoli head coach Antonio Conte shared his thoughts on the performance and the team’s mindset. Conte emphasized the importance of focusing on their own game rather than the league standings. “Before the match, I clearly told the boys not to look at the table but to think about ourselves to try to improve,” he said.
